Title: Shiroi Michi
Description: ["A song featured in NHK's ", Minna no Uta, ', it adapts "Concerto No. 4 in F minor, Op. 8, RV 297, "L\'inverno" (Winter)" aka the winter segement of Vivaldi\'s The Four Seasons. This is the 2nd MV out of three made for this song and the only animated MV; the first (1975) and third (1985) both use the same live-action footage of children playing in the snow.']
